content: 2nd chain from hook and across= 7 3 single_crochet in each st around 2 *chain 3 turn slip_stitch in same st single_crochet in next 4 increase single_crochet x 2= 6 2 st* repeat from * to * across do not stuff the teeth f/o and leave a long tail for sewing 5-6 single_crochet in each st around single_crochet the opening closed f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 5 mouth with color a chain 11 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across= 10 2 chain 1 turn increase 8 single_crochet increase= 12 3 chain 1 turn increase 10 single_crochet increase= 14 4 chain 1 turn increase 12 single_crochet increase= 16 5 chain 1 turn increase 14 single_crochet increase= 18 6 chain 1 turn increase 16 single_crochet increase= 20 7 chain 1 turn increase 18 single_crochet increase= 22 8 chain 1 turn increase 20 single_crochet increase= 24 9 chain 1 turn increase 22 single_crochet increase= 26 10 chain 1 turn blo single_crochet in each st across single_crochet around the rest of the edges of the mouth this will give the finished piece a cleaner look f/o and leave an extra long tail for sewing side fins make 2 starting with color a leave a long tail at the beginning of the chain 5 for sewing chain 5 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across= 4 2 chain 1 turn increase 2 single_crochet increase= 6 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across 4 chain 1 turn increase 4 single_crochet increase= 8 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across single_crochet around all the edges to give a cleaner look change to color d 6 *chain 3 slip_stitch in same st single_crochet in next 2 st* repeat from * to * across f/o and weave in the tail ends sweet oddity art 6 top fin version #1 starting with color a leave a long tail at the beginning of the chain 9 for sewing chain 9 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across= 8 2 chain 1 turn increase 6 single_crochet increase= 10 3 chain 1 turn increase 8 single_crochet increase= 12 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across single_crochet around the side edge bottom of the fin and opposite side of the fin change to color d 5 *chain 5 slip_stitch in same st single_crochet in next 2 st* repeat from * to * across f/o and weave in the tail end top fin version #2 with black or color of choice chain 9 1 sl in 2nd chain from hook and across= 8 2 blo chain 1 turn 5 single_crochet 3 blo chain 1 turn 5 single_crochet 4 blo chain 1 turn 5 single_crochet chain 4 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and next 2 chains 5 blo chain 1 turn 4 single_crochet 6 blo chain 1 turn 4 single_crochet 7 blo chain 1 turn 4 single_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook 8
